message.name: ERR_USERID_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: UserID must be entered.

message.name: ERR_COMMUNITY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Community must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TO_RECIPIENT_MANDATORY
message.locale: La section "Sélectionner le destinataire – À" est obligatoire. Sélectionnez un destinataire.

message.name: ERR_ONLY_ONE_TO_RECIPIENT_ALLOWED
message.locale: Veuillez sélectionner un seul destinataire pour le champ "À" et un seul pour le champ "CC".

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_SAME_INDIVIDUAL
message.locale: Impossible d'envoyer une lettre dont les destinataires aux champs "À" et "CC" sont la même personne. Modifiez votre sélection.

message.name: ERR_NO_RESULTS_RETURNED
message.locale: Aucun résultat trouvé. Modifiez les critères de recherche.

message.name: ERR_ENTER_MANDATORY_FIELDS
message.locale: The following field(s) are mandatory: %1s. Please update before submitting.

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TO_CREATE_CORRESPONDENCE
message.locale: Impossible de créer la correspondance pour le moment. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

message.name: ERR_NO_SAME_CC_ALLOWED
message.locale: Cannot have same “CC” the same individual, please update your selection.

message.name: ERR_MINIMUM_LENGTH
message.locale: Il faut saisir au moins %1n caract\u00e8res.

message.name: ERR_ID_NON_ZERO_POSITIVE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A non-zero positive value must be entered for WorkItemID

message.name: ERR_MISSING_COMMUNITY_NAME
message.locale: Please provide a value for CommunityName.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_USER_NAME
message.locale: Please provide a value for UserName.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_DATA_XML
message.locale: Please provide a value for DataXML.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_DATA_MAP_NAME
message.locale: Please provide a value for DataMapName.

message.name: ERR_INCORRECT_TEMPLATE_ID_VALUE
message.locale: Please provide a positive non-zero value for TemplateId.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_TEMPLATE_FULL_PATH
message.locale: Please provide a value for TemplateFullPath.

message.name: ERR_HTTP_404_RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The requested data could not be found. Specify a valid %1s.

message.name: ERR_HTTP_403_PERMISSION_DENIED
message.locale: You do not have permissions to perform this action.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_RESULT_MORE_THAN_50
message.locale: Il y a plus de 50 r\u00e9sultats. Pr\u00e9cisez les crit\u00e8res de recherche.

message.name: ERR_SUBMIT_OPTION_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: One of the Submit options must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_DOB_IS_MISSING
message.locale: Date of Birth for %1s is missing. Please enter the required information and try again.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_GENDER_IS_MISSING
message.locale: Gender information for %1s is missing. Please enter the required information and try again.

message.name: ERR_PREFERRED_LANGUAGE_MISSING
message.locale: Preferred Language for %1s is missing. Please enter the required information and try again.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_NAME_OR_CATEGORY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Il faut saisir le Numéro/nom du gabarit ou la Catégorie du gabarit.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_CATEGORY_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Il faut choisir la cat\u00e9gorie du gabarit avant d'en choisir la sous-cat\u00e9gorie.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_IS_MISSING
message.locale: Address information for %1s is missing. Please enter the required information and try again.

message.name: ERR_VAULT_LETTER_ID_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Please provide a value for VaultLetterID

message.name: ERR_CCT_NOT_AVAILABLE
message.locale: Error encountered when processing request, please try again later or contact the service desk.

message.name: ERR_DOC_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED
message.locale: Impossible d'annuler la correspondance pour le moment. Veuillez r\u00e9essayer plus tard.

message.name: ERR_DOC_CANNOT_BE_DOWNLOADED
message.locale: Impossible d'afficher la correspondance pour le moment. Veuillez r\u00e9essayer plus tard.

message.name: ERR_DOC_CANNOT_BE_FOUND
message.locale: Unable to get status of correspondence at this time. Please try again later.

message.name: ERR_CCT_HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED
message.locale: Unauthorized error occurred while making the request.

message.name: ERR_COMMENTS_MANDATORY
message.locale: Il faut fournir des commentaires.

message.name: ERR_STATUS_COMMENTS_MANDATORY
message.locale: Les commentaires doivent \u00EAtre saisis avant de choisir Enregistrer.

message.name: INF_STATUS_CHANGED_SUBJECT_PERSON
message.locale: Undelivered Mail %1s for Person %2s - %3s

message.name: INF_STATUS_CHANGED_SUBJECT_CASE
message.locale: Undelivered Mail %1s for Case %2s - %3s
